elements.html: Please tell us a little about yourself

elements.name: UserInfoText
elements.html:
We believe you're more likely to help us if you know your data can't be used anywhere else. We're not asking for your last name, so we have no way to connect you with any of your private data. Click the links below to learn about how your privacy is protected and what we'll be doing with this survey information.

If more than one of your beloved companions have LP, you can take the survey for each of them. You can also update the survey responses for each animal, but only one set of results are saved for each Facebook account or email and each animal. Each time you take, it, existing results will be updated with the most recent ones.

elements.name: UserInfoVerificationPanelText
elements.html:
We'll need to contact a random sample of participants for verification purposes. If you don't want to share your email, you can use your Facebook account name for verification via Facebook Messenger.

With your consent, we may also contact you to talk in more detail about your experience with LP.
